titles.title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Beatrice Braude.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 6/7/1988--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to hear, determine, and render judgment upon any claim for back pay by a named individual against the United States arising out of the termination of her employment at the United States Information Agency.
